summary: Just some armors for UNP and CBBE.
descriptionHtml:
humm... The reason of why I uploaded this mod is kinda silly, but I think I need to explain. I made a similar mod before called War Maiden, but a few days ago I accidentally deleted (I know. Pretty dumb of me haha). Luckly I still had the original mod in my computer so rather than just reupload I decided to improve a little bit by adding CBBE support, adding some new pieces and giving a better look to the armors. Anyway, with that out of the way, let\'s get down to business shall we?

[size=20]Battle Maiden[/size] 
-----------------
To install this mod, just copy the \"DATA\" folder to your skyrim directory. Usually located at (\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\).
-----------------

This mod will add three sets of armors. You\'ll need the perk \"Advanced Armors\" to create them.

Ancient Armor is a heavy set. It\'s a little stronger than the Steel Plate set and weighs less.
This set contains:
[list]
[*]4 variations of the main armor without the pauldrons
[*]4 variations of the main armor with the pauldrons
[*]1 pair of boots and 1 pair of greaves
[*]1 pair of bracers and 1 pair of gauntlets
[*]1 crown and 1 mask
[*]1 masked hood and 1 crowned hood
[/list]

Bronze Armor is light set. It\'s a little stronger than the Scaled set and weighs less.
This set cotains:
[list]
[*]4 variations of the main armor without the pauldrons
[*]4 variations of the main armor with the pauldrons
[*]1 pair of boots and 1 pair of greaves
[*]1 pair of bracers and 1 pair of gauntlets
[*]1 crown and 1 mask
[*]1 masked hood and 1 crowned hood
[/list]

And finally, the Silver Armor. Also a heavy set. It\'s stronger than the Ancient Armor, but weighs more.
This set cotains:
[list]
[*]4 variations of the skirt version of the armor
[*]6 variations of the thong version of the armor (needless to say, it\'s somewhat skimpy)
[*]1 pair of boots and 1 pair of greaves
[*]1 pair of bracers and 1 pair of gauntlets
[*]1 crown and 1 mask
[*]1 masked hood and 1 crowned hood
[/list]

There you go! I hope you have fun. If you encounter any bugs or any kind of problem, please, don\'t hesitate to ask for help.
author: zemaria
